alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 11:26PM EDT until July 08 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of north central North Carolina and northwest North Carolina, including the following counties, in north central North Carolina, Surry. In northwest North Carolina, Yadkin. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1124 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated that heavy rain has ended. However runoff from the earlier heavy rainfall will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen since 8pm. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Ararat River, Arnold Branch, Dobbins Creek, Grassy Creek, Deep Creek, East Swan Creek, Fisher River, Davenport Creek, Cobb Creek, Beaverdam Creek and Cranberry Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elkin... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Boonville... East Bend... Nebo... Shacktown... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
